entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Kapuskasing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:13 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kapuskasing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:19 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kapuskasing Airport 12:08 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: NNW 25 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow or rain. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to snow near noon. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
